title: Restore private enum value ResourceType.Prerequisite
body: The value is produced via enum string parsing even though it is not used in the MSBuild codebase directly

commit.message: Restore private enum value ResourceType.Prerequisite - the value is produced via enum string parsing even though it is not used in the MSBuild codebase directly

nodes.body: @rainersigwald Does retargeting also result in auto cherry-pick back to master? Manual cherry-pick?
No, but we (I) merge release branches back to master on a semi-regular basis.
